putDocument Attributes.ptdbxml '<attributes>
	<attribute id="countries_1277687205671" name="countries" type="List">
		<item name="India"/>
		<item name="China"/>
		<item name="Saudi Arabia"/>
		<item name="United States"/>
	</attribute>

	<attribute id="a_testId" name="author_test" type="String"/>

	</attribute>

</attributes>'
